common.app_description: HostBerry - Network Management System for Raspberry Pi

help.hero_title: We are here to keep your HostBerry running
help.hero_subtitle: Find quick answers, detailed guides, and direct access to our support channels — all with the same dashboard look & feel.

guides.heading: Guided setup journeys
guides.caption: Follow curated steps for every scenario
guides.getting_started_desc: Initial setup checklist and best practices.
guides.wifi_desc: Secure your network and manage SSIDs.
guides.security_desc: Lock down ports, firewall, and VPN access.
guides.advanced_desc: Tweak services, cron jobs, and integrations.

faqs.heading: Frequently asked questions
faqs.caption: Short answers to unblock you quickly
faqs.monitoring_q: Why are my monitoring stats stuck?
faqs.monitoring_a: Ensure HostBerry services are running and the device clock is synchronized. A reboot of the monitoring service usually helps.
faqs.security_q: How do I reapply the security rules?
faqs.security_a: Go to Security → Firewall and tap “Apply rules”. The system will validate and reload UFW plus Fail2ban.
faqs.updates_q: Is it safe to update while clients are connected?
faqs.updates_a: Yes. Updates run in the background and only restart affected services when necessary. You will be notified before a disruptive change.

links.heading: Quick resources
links.api_desc: Interactive OpenAPI specs with live testing.
links.troubleshoot_desc: Flowcharts to diagnose connectivity and security.
links.support_desc: Open tickets, follow status, and escalate issues.

contact.heading: Send us a message
contact.caption: We usually answer within a few minutes
